display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                       

[media]

**Welcome To The Most Chaotic Day Job in VR!**

Design your store, satisfy your customers, and become the ultimate supermarket manager!

[media]

**Your Store, Your Way**

Customize everything from displays to products and even your store's layout.

[media]

**Strategic Service**

Customers will react realistically to the speed and accuracy of your actions.

[media]

================================================

# New Bank Loan & Cleaning Update

**Cleaning**
- Dirt will now appear inside the store based on customer traffic and player movement. A dirty store reduces the number of customers who visit, so keeping the shop clean is now essential part of daily management.

**Bank Loans**
- You can now take loans of different amounts, each requiring a certain XP level to unlock. Loans are repaid automatically every night with a small interest fee, adding a new layer of financial strategy.

**Prisoner Behavior**
- If boxes are left outside the store, there’s a chance a prisoner may try to steal them. Players must catch him to reclaim their goods.

**Misc.**
- Various bugs fixes have also been implemented into this update.

================================================

# New Bank Loan & Cleaning Update

**Cleaning**
- Dirt will now appear inside the store based on customer traffic and player movement. A dirty store reduces the number of customers who visit, so keeping the shop clean is now essential part of daily management.

**Bank Loans**
- You can now take loans of different amounts, each requiring a certain XP level to unlock. Loans are repaid automatically every night with a small interest fee, adding a new layer of financial strategy.

**Prisoner Behavior**
- If boxes are left outside the store, there’s a chance a prisoner may try to steal them. Players must catch him to reclaim their goods.

**Misc.**
- Various bugs fixes have also been implemented into this update.
